tokens.resolved_gloss: to tie, physically (gird, confine, compact) or mentally (in love, league)

tokens.resolved_gloss: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

tokens.resolved_gloss: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, continuance (as indefinite extension); but used only (attributively as adjective) constant (or adverbially, constantly); elliptically the regular (daily) sacrifice
